mdRecord.dcterms:title: Summer and Smoke by Tennessee Williams
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for Summer and Smoke by Tennessee Williams. Directed by George Touliatos. Sets by Bennet Averyt. Costumes by Evelyn Moricle. Lighting by Stuart Richman. 40th Season.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
